title: Plots for the TILT Project
text: goal tiltPlot provide plots TILT project.

title: Plots for the TILT Project
text: Let us load toy data set.

title: Plots for the TILT Project
code: toy_data #> # A tibble: 4 × 5 #>   bank  amount amount_of_disctinct_products pctr_risk_category tilt_sec #>   <chr>  <dbl>                        <dbl> <chr>              <chr>    #> 1 A          5                            1 low                sector_a #> 2 A          5                            1 low                sector_b #> 3 B          2                            2 medium             sector_a #> 4 B         10                            2 high               sector_b plot_sankey(toy_data)

title: Create a sankey plot — plot_sankey
code: plot_sankey(toy_data) #> Links is a tbl_df. Converting to a plain data frame. #> Nodes is a tbl_df. Converting to a plain data frame.  {"x":{"links":{"source":[0,1,0,1,2,2,3,3],"target":[4,4,5,6,0,1,0,1],"value":[1,1,2,2,5,5,2,10],"group":["low","low","medium","high","low","low","medium","high"]},"nodes":{"name":["sector_a","sector_b","A","B","low","medium","high"],"group":["other","other","other","other","low","medium","high"]},"options":{"NodeID":"name","NodeGroup":"group","LinkGroup":"group","colourScale":"d3.scaleOrdinal(d3.schemeCategory20);","fontSize":14,"fontFamily":null,"nodeWidth":15,"nodePadding":10,"units":"","margin":{"top":null,"right":null,"bottom":null,"left":null},"iterations":32,"sinksRight":true}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Toy data — toy_data
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 4 rows 5 columns.

title: Toy data — toy_data
code: toy_data #> # A tibble: 4 × 5 #>   bank  amount amount_of_disctinct_products pctr_risk_category tilt_sec #>   <chr>  <dbl>                        <dbl> <chr>              <chr>    #> 1 A          5                            1 low                sector_a #> 2 A          5                            1 low                sector_b #> 3 B          2                            2 medium             sector_a #> 4 B         10                            2 high               sector_b
